DataElement.preferredName: Site Clinical Research Associate Telephone Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The phone number of the study CRA.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Site Clinical Research Associate Telephone Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted._A person who is employed by a study sponsor or by a contract research organization (CRO), operates independently from the clinical study site and functions as a monitor, and/or auditor, and/or a project director within a particular trial or institution._A sequence of decimal digits (0-9) that is used for identifying a destination telephone line or other device in a telephone network.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:A person who is employed by a study sponsor or by a contract research organization (CRO), operates independently from the clinical study site and functions as a monitor, and/or auditor, and/or a project director within a particular trial or institution.

Concepts.definition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

A person who is employed by a study sponsor or by a contract research organization (CRO), operates independently from the clinical study site and functions as a monitor, and/or auditor, and/or a project director within a particular trial or institution.

Property.preferredDefinition: A telephone number is a sequence of decimal digits (0-9) that is used for identifying a destination telephone line or other device in a telephone network.  In the US this is a ten digit number resembling "123-456-7890".

Concepts.definition: A sequence of decimal digits (0-9) that is used for identifying a destination telephone line or other device in a telephone network.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: contact information for communications over distance, including telephone and fax numbers, e-mail, and web addresses.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
